text:
Marc David Maron (born September 27, 1963) is an American stand-up comedian, podcast host and actor. He has been host of "The Marc Maron Show" and co-host of both "Morning Sedition" and "Breakroom Live". From 2013 to 2016, he starred in his own show "Maron". He also starred in a minor role in "Joker" (2019).
Maron was born in Jersey City, New Jersey. He is Jewish. He grew up in New Jersey, Alaska and Albuquerque.
He dated director Lynn Shelton until her death in May 2020.
